ht32f5xxxx_crc.c File Reference

This file provides all the CRC firmware functions. More...

#include "ht32f5xxxx_crc.h"

Go to the source code of this file.

Functions

void CRC_DeInit (HT_CRC_TypeDef *HT_CRCn)
 Deinitialize the CRC peripheral registers to their default reset values.
void CRC_Init (HT_CRC_TypeDef *HT_CRCn, CRC_InitTypeDef *CRC_InitStruct)
 Initialize the CRC peripheral according to the specified parameters in the CRC_InitStruct.
u32 CRC_Process (HT_CRC_TypeDef *HT_CRCn, u8 *buffer, u32 length)
 Get the CRC checksum from the given data.
u16 CRC_CCITT (u16 seed, u8 *buffer, u32 length)
 Get the CRC-CCITT checksum from the given data.
u16 CRC_16 (u16 seed, u8 *buffer, u32 length)
 Get the CRC-16 checksum from the given data.
u32 CRC_32 (u32 seed, u8 *buffer, u32 length)
 Get the CRC-32 checksum from the given data.

This file provides all the CRC firmware functions.
